body:
1) url for the spcified hbase version `https://github.com/apache/hbase/archive/rel/` will change once in a while.
so spack can not access some old vesions now.

2) According to `Table 2` on this web:
http://hbase.apache.org/book.html#basic.prerequisites
There's some compatible issue for JDK7 & JDK11
we changed the java version for hbase
title: hbase: refine url , java and version
